import axios from'axios';const url="http://localhost:5001/posts";// Fixed the URL
export const fetchPosts=()=>axios.get(url);export const createPost=newPost=>axios.post(url,newPost);export const updatePost=(_id,updatedPost)=>axios.patch("".concat(url,"/").concat(_id),updatedPost);export const deletePost=id=>axios.delete("".concat(url,"/").concat(id));export const likePost=id=>axios.patch("".concat(url,"/").concat(id,"/likePost"));
